trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Newport Beach
There were no other sightings in Newport Beach on or around December 29th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsDecember 29 It was around 10:10 at night and I was coming home from working the night shift. As I got out of my SUV I looked up in the sky and saw a brillant white light craft. It was spinning in the sky and would go up and down. As it went faster and faster, I noticed there were waves in the sky moving away from it and the sky looked like the rainbow effect you see when gas hits a rain puddle. It was unbelievablie beautiful. I watched it for quite some time and could see little blue sparks and gold flecks of light coming out. Then it appeared to explode into color and vanish. I was completely shocked by what I saw and had to just sit there for a few minutes and catch my breath. The next thing I knew, it appeared again. My dog Chief started barking because he was freaked out. This time it looked the same, but after a while, it seemed to change appearance and grow and it looked like a giant rainbow light jellyfish in the sky. It was so pretty. After I watched it for a long time, it finally vanished again. I don't know what that was that I saw, but it wasn't anything I'd ever seen in my life.
